title: Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Gundalian Invaders
synopsis: Bakugan Interspace is a virtual reality system, where players can brawl against each other and take part in tournaments. Initially designed to help practice and enhance Bakugan skills, it quickly became a meeting place for many enthusiasts. During one of Danma Kuusou's duels, the Interspace crashes, and he gets knocked out cold. Before regaining consciousness, he experiences a vision of Bakugan at war with each other once again.
related_anime: ['Bakugan Battle Brawlers: New Vestroia', 'Bakugan Battle Brawlers: Mechtanium Surge']
